import React, { useState } from 'react' import styles from "./Login.module.css" import axios from 'axios' function Login() { const [name, setname] = useState('') const [email, setemail] = useState('') const [password, setpass] = useState('') function handlesubmit(e){ e.preventDefault() axios.post("localhost:3001", { name:name, email: email, password: password }) .then((response) => { console.log(response); }); } return (
{setname(e.target.value)}} type="text" className={styles.login__input} placeholder="userName" />
{setemail(e.target.value)}} type="text" className={styles.login__input} placeholder="Email" />
{setpass(e.target.value)}} type="password" className={styles.login__input} placeholder="Password" />

log in via

) } export default Login
